channel.description: Automatically Logging In One thing we may quickly realize as we use our application as it currently stands is that the user has to click the “Login” button twice to actually get logged into the system. That seems a bit counterintuitive, so we should take a minute to try and fix that. Effectively, we want our application to try and request a token on behalf of the user behind the scenes as soon as the page is loaded.
